name: sandbox-worker-container
description: A Cloudflare worker that powers the repo agent with real-time streaming and a SaaS-style frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npx wrangler build
scripts.migrate:remote: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply D1_METRICS --remote
scripts.migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply D1_METRICS --local
scripts.deploy: npm run migrate:remote && npm run build && wrangler deploy
